name: Vila Park

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for two nights, and loved every minute of it. The rooms were cosy and nicely furnished, and the balcony had a beautiful view of the river that flows into Lake Bohinj.
reviews.title: Loved it.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The owner was very friendly, and offered us the chance to eat half board even though we only booked bed and breakfast. The food was lovely.
reviews.title: Fantastic value!

likes.liked: — Huge balcony, gorgeous location, well-stocked honesty bar!
likes.disliked: — Room was quite small, but balcony made up for it.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We would go back here in a shot.
reviews.title: A really classy place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here on honeymoon and had a brilliant time. It's run by the very friendly Jana and a couple of other staff. It's quite small (about 12 rooms) and she goes really out of her way to make you feel at home. Our room was quite small, but had everything we needed and a huge balcony with fantastic views over the mountains.
reviews.title: a real gem..thanks Tripadvisor !!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It's not a party location because there's very little to do in the area at night but we were happy to curl up with some of the honesty bar either in our room or in the comfy lounge. And during the day there is fantastic walking, swimming and kayaking nearby.
reviews.title: Lovely hotel, beautiful location

description: At the heart of the Triglav National Park, right next to the crystal clear, emerald green Savica stream and steps away from Lake Bohinj lies Vila Park. Listen to the birds singing and water purling, take a deep breath of mountain air and just relax.Vila Park houses eight sumptuously furnished double rooms. Each room features a balcony overlooking the surrounding hills, a TV set, a safety deposit box and a refrigerator. All rooms also offer wireless Internet access.Not only can you experience the comfort of our double rooms but you can also enjoy our breakfasts and dinners, and have fruit at your disposal all day long.
